actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Reported to House from the Committee on Armed Services with amendment, H. Rept. 94-633.
Measure recommitted to Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to permit the recall to active duty of Rear Admiral J. Edward Snyder, Junior, upon retirement in a command status as the Oceanographer of the Navy.

summary.text: Permits the recall to active duty of Rear Admiral J. Edward Snyder, Junior, upon retirement in a command status as the Oceanographer of the Navy.

titles.title: A bill to permit the recall to active duty of Rear Admiral J. Edward Snyder, Junior, upon retirement in a command status as the Oceanographer of the Navy.
